examples.label: Reason Evidence
examples.context:
I have a problem.

I think my dog is sick.
examples.best_question: Why do you think your dog is sick?
questions: How many people have you met that have had dogs that are sick?
Why you think that your dog has to be sick?

examples.label: Fact Checking
examples.context:
I am Iron Man.

I should save the world!
examples.best_question: Why do you think you can save the world?
questions: How many people have you met that have had this hallucination？

examples.label: Other cases
examples.context:
I am Iron Man.

I should save the world!

Long live the King.
examples.best_question: Why do you think you can save the world?
questions: How many people have you met that have had this hallucination？
